summary: This Enb Preset is designed for people who want their skyrim look way more colorful and beautiful.
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center][font=Times New Roman][color=#b6d7a8][size=5][u]About M[/u][/size][/color][/font][color=#b6d7a8][font=Times New Roman][size=5][u]uyrundu[/u][u]s ENB[/u][/size][/font][/color][/center][center][font=Times New Roman]
[color=#f4f4f4][size=3]Sorry if my English isn't so good. It's not my native language. I live in the Netherlands.[/size]
[/color]
[size=3]The main goal of this ENB is to give Skyrim a totally new look. It makes the game way more colorful. If you are someone who likes to see a more vanilla and realistic ENB, this isn't the preset for you because this is a fantasy style enb.[/size]





[/font]

[font=Times New Roman][color=#b6d7a8][size=5][u]About my PC[/u][/size][/color][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][size=3]
My computer has a 64 bit operating system with 8GB of RAM. My CPU is an Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4460 CPU @ 3.20MHz.
My Graphics Card is an AMD Radeon (TM) R9 200 series. I do also have an SSD Sandisk Plus 240.[/size][/font]







[font=Times New Roman][color=#b6d7a8][size=5][u]How to install[/u][/size][/color][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][size=3]1.First, you need to download the latest ENB binary. That's currently v.0.305

2.Download Muyrundus ENB

3.Download Natural Lighting and Atmoshpherics for ENB

4.Extract the following archives, Enbseries v.0.308, Muyrundus ENB and NLA.

5.Go into the Enbseries folder and select only the d3.d9.dll and the Enbhost. Copy and paste those into your skyrim folder. If you don't know where that is, you can find it to open NexusModManager, click the yellow folder with the red arrow sticking out of it and press 'open game folder'. You can also find it manually. Go to local disc (C:), Program Files (x86), Steam, Steamapps, Common, Skyrim.

6.Open Muyrundus ENB, select all the three files. Do not select the 'How to turn off depth of field'. Copy and paste those three files also in your Skyrim folder. The same folder where you put the d3.d9.dll and the Enbhost.

7.Open the NLA folder. You only need the data folder. Right click and select 'Add to archive'. Call it 'NLA Data'.

8.Go to your NexusModManager, click on the green plus on the upper right and select 'Add mod from file'. Search the NLA Data and click 'Ok'. When you've done that, you need to activate it.


To tweak the Enblocal, you can watch [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FHCYoVB8P_Y]this[/url] video made by Slothability. It's a damn good tutorial.



After the Enblocal settings, the only steps left are the SkyrimPrefs.ini changes.

bFloatPoinRenderTarget=1
bDrawlandShadows=1
bDrawShadowsOnGrass=1
bTreesRecieveShadows=1
iMultiSample=0
iMaxAnisotropy=1




Well done, you've just installed Muyrundus Enb!

To uninstall it, you need to deactivate the NLA Data in NMM, and delete the d3.d9.dll, Enbhost, Enbseries, EnbLocal and the Enbseries in your Skyrim folder.


[/size][/font]




[color=#b6d7a8][font=Times New Roman][size=5][u]Recommended Mods[/u][/size][/font][/color]
[font=Times New Roman][size=3]
[/size][/font][/center][center][font=Times New Roman][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655/?]Static Mesh Improvement Mod[/url] by Brumbek[/size][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45807/?]NobleSkyrimHD[/url] by Shutt3r
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/?]Realistic Water Two[/url] by Isoku
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?]Flora Overhaul[/url] by Vurt
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60220/?]Verdant[/url] by Preeum
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58212/?]Remove Exterior Fog[/url] by Gazawisay[/size][/font]







[font=Times New Roman][color=#b6d7a8][size=5][u]CREDITS[/u][/size][/color][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][size=3][url=http://enbdev.com/]Boris Vorontsov[/url] for creating the Enbseries

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44752/?]Soulwynd[/url]
[url=http://http.developer.nvidia.com/GPUGems3/gpugems3_ch28.html]GPU Gems[/url] and [url=http://developer.amd.com/wordpress/media/2012/10/Scheuermann_DepthOfField.pdf]Thorsten Scheuermann[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24024/]gp65cj04[/url][/size][/font][/center]

[center][font=Times New Roman][color=#b6d7a8][size=5][u]Permissions
[/u][/size][/color][/font]
[font=Times New Roman][size=3]I don't give any permissions.[/size][/font][/center]
author: Smoothlias
